page.title: 14HOME LIFE
page.content: My digital watch woke me at 7.0 a.m. I washed, prayed, ate my breakfast of Cornflakes and orange, dressed in my uniform and walked to school. From 9.0 a.m. to 3.30 p.m. I worked in school, with one hour's break for lunch. Our morning work was mathematics, followed by English language and then Religious Education. In the afternoon we had a craft lesson. I am making a wool cushion on a circular weaving loom. After school I rode my Commando bike, watched a television programme, and read some of my book. We had a family meal and I went to bed at 7.30 p.m.
